data.title: Paul's News
data.text:
The Swing-Ska Group One Eighty is changing their name to One Eighty Inc. due to forces beyond their control.

Not For the Crowd

The newest members to the BEC line-up are a band called, "Not For the Crowd." Get a preview on the BEC Sampler, "Mom's Like Us Too!"

Noggintoboggan

Buck hase been touring heavily the past few months from Michigan to Georgia. They finished thier music video for Samaritan two weeks ago. 2 weeks ago they played live/un-plugged on Way FM in Kalamazoo. They played 2 songs, and they also did a live interview with them. Their album was moved back to Jan. 12th. They want to have more time to advertise and stuff. However copies of their new cd will be available at some concerts.

Ghoti Hook

Ghoti Hook has been on the CMJ Radio (College Music Journal) charts since the record was released. The peak so far has been #58, their new record has recieved lots of air play thanks to all the fans that have called to request their songs and all the DJ's and Music Directors who have been cool with them.

In 3 months they have sold 50% of what we sold with Banana Man in a year.

Gordon Gano of the Violent Femmes expressed appreciation for their cover of "Hey Nonny Nonny".

That's it for now. More to come for other bands later.
